snippet: Mr. Giraud, the French comic-book artist who used “Moebius” as his nom de plume, was known for a dystopian vision and characters like Blueberry.
abstract: Jean Giraud, French comic-book artist known as Moebius, dies at age 73.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Giraud, the French comic-book artist who used “Moebius” as his nom de plume, was known for a dystopian vision and characters like Blueberry.

headline.seo: Jean Giraud, the Comic-Book Artist ‘Moebius,’ Dies at 73
headline.main: Jean Giraud, the Comic-Book Artist Known as ‘Moebius,’ Dies at 73
headline.print_headline: Jean Giraud, Comics Artist Known as Moebius, Dies at 73
